DOC.criteria: Patients baseline SWNK < =70 Provision sign informed consent Outpatients schizophrenia , schizophreniform disorder schizoaffective disorder , severe postpartum depressive disorder psychotic symptom minimum HAMD cut score 20 point Evidence clinical relevant disease , eg renal hepatic impairment , significant coronary heart disease , hepatitis B C , AIDS Patients know cardiovascular disease condition predispose hypotension family history QT prolongation Patients pose imminent risk suicide danger self others
